description: Commands to manage user tokens for a Communication Service resource.

commands.name: az communication user-identity token get-for-teams-user
commands.summary: Exchanges an Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) access token of a Teams user for a new ACS Identity access token with a matching expiration time.

commands.name: az communication user-identity token issue
commands.summary: Issues a new access token with the specified scopes for a given User Identity. If no User Identity is specified, creates a new User Identity as well.
examples: az communication user-identity token issue --scope chat
az communication user-identity token issue --scope chat voip --user "8:acs:xxxxxx"

commands.name: az communication user-identity token revoke
commands.summary: Revokes all access tokens for the specific ACS Identity.
